credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 21.5 x 20 cm (8 7/16 x 7 7/8 in.)
title: Sample
description: Twill weave of heavy white yarns with silver metallic yarn. Warp is white plied string, white boucle and double wrapped silver yarn in regular sequence. Weft is a regular sequence of white chenille, white 3-ply thick yarn, and white yarn braided over a central core.
name: Sample
